duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage project schedules and identify possible issues, communicating them to project stakeholders and management.
Collaborate with Partner teams and manage personnel.
Provide leadership in project management and personnel management.
Manage risk and demonstrate flexibility in project execution.
Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure timely project delivery.
Create dashboards and project data to top-level management to report overall progress of engagements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
